testcase.name: Wales user NHS cost
testcase.system-out: Given I am on nhsbsa homepage...............................................passed When I click Start..........................................................passed And I select Wales and click Next button....................................passed And I enter my dob "12", "12", "1990" and click Next button.................passed And I select "no" for my living situation question and click Next button....passed And I select "no" for my Benefit or Tax credit situation question and click Next button.passed And I select "no" for my pregnancy or birth situation question and click Next button.passed And I select "no" for injury or illness from armed forces questions and click Next button.passed And I select "no" for diabetic condition question and click Next button.....passed And I select "no" for glaucoma condition question and click Next button.....passed And I select "no" for live permanently in a care question and click Next button.passed And I select "no" for savings and investment option and click Next button...passed Then decision should contain "You get free:" and "You get help with NHS costs".passed
